error.message: Class Drupal\cacheflush_advanced\Tests\CacheFlushAdvancedTest extends deprecated class Drupal\simpletest\WebTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to cacheflush.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
